subtitle: Mango adds an exotic flavour to this dish.

method.text: Heat the oil in a large pan or wok. Add the chicken and allspice to the pan. Stir fry for 8-10 min or until well browned. Season.
Stir in the plum jam and wine. Bring to the boil then simmer for 3-5 min or until chicken is well glazed.
Stir in the mango slices. Heat through for a further 5 min. Serve immediately in a warmed serving dish.

title: Fruity chicken
